e	
second. It doesn’t matter if 
they are not interested or 
don’t feed for long, or even 
if they feed for longer on the 
second	breast.	This	is	fine	
–	just	start	with	this	breast	
next time. Sometimes your 
baby might seem hungrier 
than usual and feed for 
longer or more often. Your 
body responds automatically 
and makes more milk to 
provide the extra needed. 
This is why you can feed 
more than one baby at the 
same time (see page 125).
• There	is	no	need	to	offer	
formula milk in additio
